sentences.english: 'I wanted to see everything, ' See said.
sentences.chinese: 鄺麗莎說，我想看到所有的東西。

sentences.english: He is now a Chairman of Hong Kong Institution of Engineers, Building Division.
sentences.chinese: 鄺先生現爲香港工程師學會建造分部主席。

sentences.english: Mr Kwong, Samson killed six, hemp firmly missing.
sentences.chinese: 鄺先生被害，孫六被殺，麻穩穩失蹤。

sentences.english: Clearly Kwong's example failed to inspire self-introspection within the KMT.
sentences.chinese: 鄺的例子，顯然也沒給國民黨太多啓示。

sentences.english: Yes, It was the scene that Kuang kissed Wong in final phase of film.
sentences.chinese: 就是鄺裕民最後親吻王佳芝那場。

sentences.english: Wang plays Kuang Yumin, a student leader in the conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏飾演捲入此項陰謀之中的愛國學生領袖鄺裕民。

sentences.english: Was really a good boy in his childhood, in my memory.
sentences.chinese: 鄺建昌真正地是一個好男孩在他的童年，在我的記憶。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
